General Information:

L2JMods is an add-on, fully written in Java, for Java Servers that allows you add mods without any server modification. What is a mod? It's a customization of some parts of original game. For example, raid boss events, dress me, achievements system, turn the sky red when a player kills another, etc.
L2JMods was made with love and we hope you can enjoy it so much!

Commands:

// mod_menu: Go to main menu of engine.
// mod_info: Basic information of engine.
// mod_list: Mods list, to configurate.
// mod_reload: Reload all mods installed.
// mod_state: Change state of mod by name.

Links:

Web: http://www.l2jdevs.org
